description: Root repository for the convexus-sdk-js suite

scripts.publish_icon_toolkit: cd packages/icon-toolkit && yarn bump && yarn pub && cd ../../ && yarn install && yarn bootstrap
scripts.publish_sdk_core: cd packages/sdk-core && yarn bump && yarn pub && cd ../../ && yarn install && yarn bootstrap && npx lernaupdate --non-interactive --dependency @convexus/icon-toolkit
scripts.publish_sdk: cd packages/sdk && yarn bump && yarn pub && cd ../../ && yarn install && yarn bootstrap && npx lernaupdate --non-interactive --dependency @convexus/sdk-core
scripts.publish: yarn run publish_icon_toolkit && yarn run publish_sdk_core || yarn run publish_sdk
scripts.clean: npx rimraf -rf coverage node_modules package-lock.json yarn.lock && npx lerna run clean --stream --parallel
